tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_feedback (
  customer_id UUID,
  product_id UUID,
  feedback_text TEXT,
  feedback_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE CustomerFeedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    product_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    feedback_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE ProductInformation (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name TEXT,
    category TEXT,
    price DECIMAL,
    launch_date DATE
);
CREATE TABLE feedback (feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_id INT, product_id INT, rating INT, feedback_text TEXT, feedback_date TIMESTAMP);
CREATE TABLE customer (customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_name TEXT, email TEXT, phone_number TEXT);
CREATE TABLE product (product_id INT PRIMARY KEY, product_name TEXT, category TEXT, launch_date DATE);

CREATE TABLE feedback (
    feedback_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT NOT NULL,
    product_id INT NOT NULL,
    feedback_date DATE,
    feedback_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE reviews ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    customer_id INT, 
    product_id INT, 
    rating INT, 
    feedback TEXT 
);
